CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 17, 1955, pg. A29, reads: : Dear to Heart - Miss Mary Adeline McKibben, director of art in Pittsburgh schools, and Chris Byrd, senior high school winner from Westinghouse, derived satisfaction from the art contest who entries reflected that the redevelopment of Pittsburgh is being brought about by the work of persons of various racial and religious backgrounds. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Pittsburgh Public Schools Art Director Mary Adeline McKibben, and Westinghouse High School student Chris Byrd holding his prize winning painting, for Ninth Annual Art Contest, Board of Education, Oakland
